features.featureTitle: In frontend/src/components/BirdDataTable.tsx only, update the 'Zone' (المنطقة) column so that any cell displaying the value 'Tropical' renders '40' instead. This change must apply to both the read-only display cells and the editable input fields in inline-edit mode. Do NOT change any other column definitions, layout, RTL orientation, horizontal scrolling behavior, color scheme, admin access control logic, data-fetching logic, font sizes, action buttons, or any other aspect of the component. Do NOT modify any other file, component, page, route, or backend file.
